Articles.Content: If I buy a gift code for KSP, does the recipient get an email immediately?
That may depend on where you're planning on buying it from. All I know is Steam, and the answer for that is "no, not until you actually send the gift".
I was planning on buying it from the KSP website. The recipient doesn't use steam.
KSP as a gif
It would be cool. But all the people i know are only interested in other stuff. Not rocket science,
